name: GERMA 66
effect: [Main] You may trash 1 {GERMA 66} type Character card with 4000 power or less from your hand: If the number of DON!! cards on your field is equal to or less than the number on your opponent's field, play up to 1 Character card with 5000 to 7000 power and the same card name as the trashed card from your trash.
